Those who abuse benzodiazepines and the doctors that over prescribe them have given them such a negative image. If used properly, in low doses, with positive doctor support, they are amazingly helpful!

Thereâ€™s nothing to fear, if you have a good doctor to work with and who listens and understands your fears, itâ€™s a lifesaving drug for so many!

Before I was in the hospital at least 3 times a week, thinking I was dying. I was afraid to drive, to leave the house, to exercise, all the things I always took for granted.
